required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effectiveness Study of Nivolumab Compared to Chemotherapy in Patients With Relapsed Small-cell Lung Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-label, Randomized, Phase 3 Study of Nivolumab or Chemotherapy in Subjects With Relapsed Small-cell Lung Cancer After Platinum-based First Line Chemotherapy (CheckMate 331: CHECKpoint Pathway and nivoluMAb Clinical Trial Evaluation 331)

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to compare the overall survival of nivolumab versus chemotherapy in subjects with relapsed SCLC.

primary_outcome.time_frame: OS was followed continuously while participants were on the study drug and every 3 months ,minimum follow up for overall survival was 15.8 months
primary_outcome.description: The time from randomization to the date of death, data was based on Kaplan-Meier Estimates.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: assessed every 6 weeks from the first dose to week 30, and every 12 weeks up to 34 months.
secondary_outcome.description: the time from randomization to the date of the first documented tumor progression (based on investigator assesment,using Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors (RECIST)1.1 criteria) or death the data was based on Kaplan-Meier Estimates. PFS was censored when subsequent anti cancer therapy was started before progression.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Between the date of randomization and the date of progression or the date of subsequent anti-cancer therapy,whichever occurs first up to 34 months
secondary_outcome.description: The proportion of all randomized Participants who achieved BOR(Best Overall response) from baseline is either a CR(complete response) or PR(Partial response),using the RECIST v1.1 criteria based on investigator assessment,CR+PR, confidence interval based on the Clopper and Pearson method

arm_group.description: Amrubicin intravenous infusion as specified (upon investigator's choice, where locally approved for 2nd line SCLC treatment)

criteria.textblock:
For more information regarding BMS clinical trial participation, please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com
Inclusion Criteria:
- Histologically or cytologically confirmed small cell lung cancer (SCLC)
- Subjects with either limited or extensive disease stage at the initial diagnosis
- Must have recurrence or progression after platinum-based first-line chemotherapy or chemoradiation therapy for the treatment of limited or extensive disease stage SCLC
- Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status 0 or 1
Exclusion Criteria:
- Untreated or symptomatic central nervous system (CNS) metastases
- Prior therapy with anti-PD-1, anti-PDL1, anti-PD-L2, anti-CD137, or anti-CTLA-4 antibody
- Inadequate hematologic or hepatic function

facility.name: Univ Of Ark For Med Sci
Smilow Cancer Hospital. At Yale New Haven
Azienda Ospedaliera - Nuovo Ospedale San Gerardo
Klinika Nowotworow Pluca i Klatki Piersiowej

participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: 803 Participants were enrolled into the study,569 Randomized ,212 not randomized, reasons not randomized:2 adverse events(AEs),20 consent withdraw, 12 death, 2 loss of follow up,176 not meet study criteria.

category.title: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

outcome.title: Overall Survival (OS)
outcome.description: The time from randomization to the date of death, data was based on Kaplan-Meier Estimates.
outcome.time_frame: OS was followed continuously while participants were on the study drug and every 3 months ,minimum follow up for overall survival was 15.8 months

measure.title: Overall Survival (OS)
measure.description: The time from randomization to the date of death, data was based on Kaplan-Meier Estimates.

analysis.estimate_desc: Stratified Cox proportional hazard model. Hazard Ratio is Nivolumab over Topotecan/Amrubicin

outcome.title: Progression Free Survival (PFS )
outcome.description: the time from randomization to the date of the first documented tumor progression (based on investigator assesment,using Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors (RECIST)1.1 criteria) or death the data was based on Kaplan-Meier Estimates. PFS was censored when subsequent anti cancer therapy was started before progression.
outcome.time_frame: assessed every 6 weeks from the first dose to week 30, and every 12 weeks up to 34 months.

measure.title: Progression Free Survival (PFS )
measure.description: the time from randomization to the date of the first documented tumor progression (based on investigator assesment,using Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors (RECIST)1.1 criteria) or death the data was based on Kaplan-Meier Estimates. PFS was censored when subsequent anti cancer therapy was started before progression.

analysis.estimate_desc: Stratified Cox proportional hazard model. Hazard Ratio is Nivolumab over Topotecan/Amrubicin

outcome.title: Objective Response Rate (ORR)
outcome.description: The proportion of all randomized Participants who achieved BOR(Best Overall response) from baseline is either a CR(complete response) or PR(Partial response),using the RECIST v1.1 criteria based on investigator assessment,CR+PR, confidence interval based on the Clopper and Pearson method
outcome.time_frame: Between the date of randomization and the date of progression or the date of subsequent anti-cancer therapy,whichever occurs first up to 34 months

measure.title: Objective Response Rate (ORR)
measure.description: The proportion of all randomized Participants who achieved BOR(Best Overall response) from baseline is either a CR(complete response) or PR(Partial response),using the RECIST v1.1 criteria based on investigator assessment,CR+PR, confidence interval based on the Clopper and Pearson method

reported_events.time_frame: Reporting Adverse Events (AEs) include events reported between first dose and 30 days after last dose of study therapy.
reported_events.desc: If a participant experienced more than 1 of a given AE, the participant is counted only once for that AE.

category.title: Neoplasms benign, malignant and unspecified (incl cysts and polyps)

event.sub_title: Squamous cell carcinoma of the tongue

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The only disclosure restriction on the PI is that the sponsor can review results communications prior to public release and can embargo communications regarding trial results for a period that is less than or equal to 60 days. The sponsor cannot require changes to the communication and cannot extend the embargo.
